p:
qRT-PCR-based diagnostic techniques have several advantages. First, it is more suitable for early stage diagnosis than the antigenâ€“antibody reaction, since it takes time to trigger the immune response. Second, qRT-PCR can dynamically monitor the degree of viral infection and assess the prognosis. However, the COVID-19 diagnostic FNR of qRT-PCR exceeded 30%.
17, 59 Some asymptomatic COVID-19 patients show abnormal manifestations on their CT images before positive qRT-PCR.
60
